member.name: T:OpenWeatherMap.Util.CacheMode
member.summary: A set of supported caching modes.

member.name: F:OpenWeatherMap.Util.CacheMode.AllowDownload
member.summary: Allows caching and downloading.

member.name: F:OpenWeatherMap.Util.CacheMode.Download
member.summary: Does not try to get the request from the cache, this will always try to download the resource even if it is in cache.

member.name: F:OpenWeatherMap.Util.CacheMode.CacheOnly
member.summary: Throws an exception if the requested resource is not cached.

member.name: F:OpenWeatherMap.Util.CacheMode.Default
member.summary: The default .

member.name: T:OpenWeatherMap.Util.ForecastType
member.summary: Supported forecast types.

member.name: F:OpenWeatherMap.Util.ForecastType.Hourly
member.summary: Hourly forecast for four days.

member.name: F:OpenWeatherMap.Util.ForecastType.ThreeHour
member.summary: Three hour forecast for five days.

member.name: F:OpenWeatherMap.Util.ForecastType.Daily
member.summary: Daily weather forecast for 16 days.

member.name: T:OpenWeatherMap.Util.RequestOptions
member.summary: Request options for .

member.name: P:OpenWeatherMap.Util.RequestOptions.Default
member.summary: Gets the default request options (can be changed to change the default behavior, note that other services behavior may change).

member.name: P:OpenWeatherMap.Util.RequestOptions.CacheMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the caching mode to use when requesting.

member.name: P:OpenWeatherMap.Util.RequestOptions.CancellationToken
member.summary: A cancellation token used to propagate notification that the request should be canceled.

member.name: P:OpenWeatherMap.Util.RequestOptions.Language
member.summary: Gets or sets the response language.

member.name: P:OpenWeatherMap.Util.RequestOptions.Unit
member.summary: Gets or sets the unit for the response units.

member.name: T:OpenWeatherMap.Util.UnitType
member.summary: A set of different unit types supported by OpenWeatherMap.

member.name: F:OpenWeatherMap.Util.UnitType.Default
member.summary: When specified temperature is returned in Kelvin and speeds are returned in meter per second (meter/sec).

member.name: F:OpenWeatherMap.Util.UnitType.Metric
member.summary: When specified temperature is returned in Celsius and speeds are returned in meter per second (meter/sec).

member.name: F:OpenWeatherMap.Util.UnitType.Imperial
member.summary: When specified temperature is returned in Fahrenheit and speeds are returned in miles per hour (miles/hour).
